<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var vehicle;
var vehicleInfo;
var ready;
var stage;

var year;
var make;
var model;
var option;
var step;

var ddlYear;
var ddlMake;
var ddlModel;
var ddlOption;
var ddlSize;
var aCatalog;

function sendRequest(onReadyMethod, url, params, HttpMethod) {
	if (!HttpMethod) { HttpMethod = "GET"; }
	req = null;

	if (window.XMLHttpRequest) { req = new XMLHttpRequest; } //mozilla/safari 
	else if (window.ActiveXObject) { req = new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP"); } //internet explorer 

	if (req) {
	    req.onreadystatechange = onReadyMethod;
		req.open(HttpMethod, url, true);
		req.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");
		req.send(params);
	}
}

function pageLoadReadyState() {
    onReadyState();
    if (ready == 4) {
        if (stage == "1") {
        ddlMake.selectedIndex = $("#ddlmake3765 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[1] + "']").index();
        makeClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        } else if (stage == "2") {
        ddlModel.selectedIndex = $("#ddlmodel3765 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[2] + "']").index();
        modelClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        } else if (stage == "3") {
        ddlOption.selectedIndex = $("#ddloption3765 > option[value='" + vehicleInfo[3] + "']").index();
        optionClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
        }
    }
}

function onReadyState() {
    ready = req.readyState;
    var data = null;
    if (ready == 4) { //check ready state 
        data = req.responseText; //read response data 
        var items = data.split('|');
        var length = items.length;
        stage = items[0];
        if (stage == "1") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlMake, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "2") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlModel, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "3") {
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlOption, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        } else if (stage == "4") {
            ddlSize.removeChild(ddlSize.firstChild);
            for (var i = 1; i < length - 1; i++) {
                createOption(ddlSize, items[i], items[i]);
            }
        }
    }
}

function createOption(parent, value, text) {
    var newOption = document.createElement('option');
    parent.appendChild(newOption);
    newOption.value = value;
    newOption.innerHTML = text;
}

function setUpVars() {
    ddlYear = document.getElementById("ddlyear3765");
    ddlMake = document.getElementById("ddlmake3765");
    ddlModel = document.getElementById("ddlmodel3765");
    ddlOption = document.getElementById("ddloption3765");
    ddlSize = document.getElementById("ddlsize3765");
    aCatalog = document.getElementById("cataloglink3765")
}

function yearClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
   	step = "year";
	var selected = ddlYear.selectedIndex;
	year = ddlYear.options[selected].value;
	resetMakes();
	resetModels();
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
		sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=one&year=' + year);
		ddlYear.disabled = 0;
		ddlMake.disabled = 0;
		ddlModel.disabled = 1;
		ddlOption.disabled = 1;
		ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function makeClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "make";
	var selected = ddlMake.selectedIndex;
	make = ddlMake.options[selected].value;
	resetModels();
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=two&year=' + year + '&make=' + make);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 1;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function modelClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "model";
	var selected = ddlModel.selectedIndex;
	model = escape(ddlModel.options[selected].value);
	resetOptions();
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=three&year=' + year + '&make=' + make + '&model=' + model);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 0;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 1;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '25px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '300px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '25px';
		}
	}
}

function optionClicked(readyStateMethod) {
    if (!readyStateMethod) { readyStateMethod = onReadyState }
	step = "option";
	var selected = ddlOption.selectedIndex;
	option = escape(ddlOption.options[selected].value);
	resetSizes();
	if (selected != 0) {  //if they choose something other than the first select
	    sendRequest(readyStateMethod, '/DesktopModules/VehicleLookupBar/fetch.aspx?step=four&year=' + year + '&make=' + make + '&model=' + model + '&option=' + option);
	    ddlYear.disabled = 0;
	    ddlMake.disabled = 0;
	    ddlModel.disabled = 0;
	    ddlOption.disabled = 0;
	    ddlSize.disabled = 0;
		if (ie == 1) {
		    ddlYear.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlMake.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlModel.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlOption.style.width = '80px';
		    ddlSize.style.width = '80px';
		}
	}
}

function setCookie(c_name, value, exdays){
    var exdate = new Date();
    exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
    var c_value = value + ((exdays == null) ? '' : '; expires=' + exdate.toUTCString());
    document.cookie = c_name + '=' + c_value;
}

function getCookie(c_name) {
    var c_value = document.cookie;
    var c_start = c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
    if (c_start == -1) {
        c_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
    }
    if (c_start == -1) {
        c_value = null;
    }
    else {
        c_start = c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end = c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1) {
            c_end = c_value.length;
        }
        c_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start, c_end));
    }
    return c_value;
}

function goToCatalog() {
    if (ddlOption.selectedIndex != 0) {
        var vehicleInfo = $('#ddlyear3765 option:selected').text() + ' ' +
                          $('#ddlmake3765 option:selected').text() + ' - ' +
                          $('#ddlmodel3765 option:selected').text() + ' (' +
                          $('#ddloption3765 option:selected').text() + ')';
        setCookie('vehicle', vehicleInfo, 1);
	    var selected = ddlSize.selectedIndex;
	    var size = ddlSize.options[selected].value;
	    var s = size.split(' ');
	    var width = s[0];
	    var aspect = s[1];
	    var rim = s[2];
	    var url = 'http://www.hillcountrytire.com/shop-for-tires.aspx' + '?view=SR&width=' + width + '&aspect=' + aspect + '&rim=' + rim + '&brand=-1';
	    window.location = url;
	} else {
	    alert('Please select a vehicle (Year, Make, Model, Option, & Size.)');
    }
}

function resetMakes() {
    while (ddlMake.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlMake.removeChild(ddlMake.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlMake, '-1', '- Make -');
    ddlMake.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetModels() {
    while (ddlModel.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlModel.removeChild(ddlModel.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlModel, '-1', '- Model -');
    ddlModel.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetOptions() {
    while (ddlOption.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlOption.removeChild(ddlOption.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlOption, '-1', '- Option -');
    ddlOption.selectedIndex = 0;
}

function resetSizes() {
    while (ddlSize.hasChildNodes()) { //removes items from dropdown if some already exist
        ddlSize.removeChild(ddlSize.firstChild);
    }
    createOption(ddlSize, '-1', '- Size -');
    ddlSize.selectedIndex = 0;
}

$(document).ready(function () {
    setUpVars();

    if (getCookie("vehicle") != null) {
        vehicle = getCookie("vehicle");
        vehicleInfo = new Array();

        vehicleInfo[0] = vehicle.substring(0, 4);
        vehicleInfo[1] = vehicle.substring(5, vehicle.indexOf('-') - 1);
        vehicleInfo[2] = vehicle.substring(vehicle.indexOf('-') + 2, vehicle.indexOf('(') - 1);
        vehicleInfo[3] = vehicle.substring(vehicle.indexOf('(') + 1, vehicle.length - 1);

        ddlYear.selectedIndex = $("#ddlyear3765 > option:contains(" + vehicleInfo[0] + ")").index();
        yearClicked(pageLoadReadyState);
    }
});//]]>
</script>

	<div id="dnn_ctr3766_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_3766 --><div id="dnn_ctr3766_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr3766_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
		<div id="side">
<div class="option">
<h2 class="webfont">Shop For Tires</h2>
<p>Search our tire catalog for the most popular in brand name tires from manufacturers like MICHELIN®, BFGoodrich® and Uniroyal®.</p>
<a href="http://www.hillcountrytire.com/shop-for-tires.aspx" class="side-link">&gt; Shop For Tires</a></div>
<div class="option">
<h2 class="webfont">Shop For Service</h2>
<p>Car problems? Check out our available auto services to get you back and running again.</p>
<a href="http://www.hillcountrytire.com/auto-repairs.aspx" class="side-link">&gt; View Our Services</a></div>
<div class="option last">
<h2 class="webfont">Save With Coupons</h2>
<p>Check back regularily for discounts and promotions on tires and services.</p>
<a href="http://www.hillcountrytire.com/coupons.aspx" class="side-link">&gt; See Current Deals</a></div>
</div>
	</div>

</div><!-- End_Module_3766 --></div>

</div>


</div></div>
            <div id="dnn_ContentPane" class="grid_8"><div class="DnnModule DnnModule-DNN_HTML DnnModule-12910"><a name="12910"></a>

<div class="c_DNN6 c_DNN6_Header">
	
	<div class="pc-common">
		<div class="pc-header"><h1><span id="dnn_ctr12910_dnnTitle_titleLabel" class="Head"> 24 Hour Roadside Assistance</span>


</h1></div>
		<div class="pc-body">
			<div id="dnn_ctr12910_ContentPane" class="wrapper"><!-- Start_Module_12910 --><div id="dnn_ctr12910_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr12910_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
		<div>
<p>Our superior roadside assistance is available to customers in Marble Falls, Bertram and surrounding communities 24 hours a day. <a href="http://www.hillcountrytire.com/">Hill Country Tire &amp; Automotive</a> responds to your needs for roadside assistance that you can rely on. We get your vehicle up and running or towed when you need it the most. We also offer services for 18 wheeled trucks. For roadside assistant please call us at <strong>(512)756-6666</strong>.</p>
<p><img width="250" height="165" style="float:right;" src="http://assets.netdrivenwebs.com/img/pages/24hr-roadside/24hourroadside.jpg" alt="24 hr Roadside Assistance Burnet, TX" /></p>
<p>Our services include:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Towing assistance</li>
    <li>Transmission</li>
    <li>Flat-tire changes on-site</li>
    <li>Fuel delivery if the vehicle runs out of fuel</li>
    <li>Jump-starts for dead batteries</li>
    <li>Lockout assistance</li>
</ul>
<p>You can rely on Hill Country Tire &amp; Automotive for your roadside emergency needs.</p>
</div>
	</div>

</div><!-- End_Module_12910 --></div>
		</div>
		<div class="pc-footer"></div>
	</div>
</div>
